title: Exicom acquires US EV charging company Tritium for Rs 310 cr
description: Exicom has acquired US-based Tritium for USD 37 million, marking a significant expansion in the EV charging sector. The company is setting up a manufacturing unit in Hyderabad, operational by 2025, to leverage Tritium’s DC fast charging technology. This move aims to enhance Exicom’s global standing and operational capabilities.
